modName: Improved weapons enchantments FX - animated effect shaders
summary: This mod replaces vanilla static enchantment effects with new custom made animated effects.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a simple texture replacer, which I made because other similar mods didn\'t suit my taste fully. It modify a few FX shaders used by magic effects of weapon enchantments replacing textures and setting animations for them. New effects are mixed and combined from some free textures and their minimum size is 512x512 pixels.
Unfortunately I didn’t add particle shaders because I don’t know how to edit nif files, I tried to follow the guides, but my every attempt ended in failure.

How they look in game is shown on this video: [url=http://youtu.be/KHZY5FwPzcQ]http://youtu.be/KHZY5FwPzcQ[/url] (It\'s my first video - quite poor)
And here: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3j5jyQhV64)]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3j5jyQhV64[/url]
[youtube]h3j5jyQhV64[/youtube] 
Thanks [color=green][b]BDMods[/b][/color] !!!

The effects are more visible in a dark environment, I didn\'t want make them too bright. But if there will be a need I can do a version where they will be brighter.

The only issue that cannot be fixed is related to the way how effects shaders are applied to the texture. In most cases e.g. in swords the blade texture is divided into several pieces sometimes arranged at different angles on texture. So it is possible that you will see the boundaries between these pieces and even the animation will move in different directions on the weapon.

Install:
Just unzip archive to data folder (allow overwrite if ask) and check ImpWeapEnchFX.esp in loading list.

Uninstall:
Delete ImpWeapEnchFX.esp and delete files whose name begins with \"newEnchFX\" from “Data\\textures\\effects\\”.

Compatibility:
This mod is incompatible with any mod that alters effect shaders used by magic effects of weapon enchantments.
Important: This mod does not override/edit any textures from the vanilla game, so it is fully compatible with any mods that utilize effect textures.
______________________________________
Weapon textures used in screenshots: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
Dvarven weapons from my mom: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30998]Dwemer bronze and steel - Dwarven weapons recolor[/url] 
Cloak from: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url] 
Helmet: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15927]Improved Close Faced Helmets[/url] 
Graphic mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates Of Tamriel[/url] 
ENB: I don\'t remember for sure, but maybe it\'s official CoT ENB
author: darkman24
